level.heading: Closings authorized; disposition of property; proposed closing of public way - notice, hearing; plans; order; recordation; in rem proceeding - instituted upon objection to order; damages; assessment of benefits; abandonment; petition by property owners for closing; prior laws to remain in force; short title.
Legislative History of Law 4-201
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-201, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 9-201.01.
